Release Notes 1.2

New Features

  • Customizable Tab Bar Position: Choose where your Tab Bar appears â€“ left side (default), center, or right side.
  • Quick Search Mode: New option to open Tab Bar with search immediately activated, including custom keybind support (Default is CMD+K).
  • More Apps with Tab Support: Added support for Notion, Brave Browser, and Microsoft Edge.
  • App Filtering: New ability to ignore specific apps with improved reliability.
  • Quick App Termination: Hover over tabs and use CMD+Q to quickly quit applications.
  • Expanded Language Support: Better support for French, German, Korean, Spanish, Arabic, and Chinese (Hong Kong).

Bug Fixes

  • Comestic improvements to the Tab Bar.
  • Fixed occasional issue of windows disappearing unexpectedly.
  • Resolved problems where the Tab Bar wouldn't respond to hotkey activation.
  • Some stability improvements and minor bug fixes.
